ingredients: 1 can tomato paste plus 4 cans water
instructions: Melt the butter in a large pot and add the onions.  Cook until translucent.
Add the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, water, sugar, vegetable paste, basil, salt, and pepper.
Stir well wile heating almost to a boil.
Use an immersion blender to blend the soup.  If you prefer chunkier soup, you can remove some tomoto and onion prior to blending.
Stir in the cream and simmer another 5 - 10 minutes.
